programme.title: Live WTA Tennis
programme.desc: The AEGON International. Coverage of the fifth day from the Devonshire Park Lawn Tennis Club in Eastbourne, where the semi-finals get under way. Slovakia's Dominika Cibulkova won the tournament last year and was set to return and defend her crown this time around. However, pre-tournament British hopes were placed on world number six Johanna Konta, looking to become the first home winner of this event since Virginia Wade in 1975

Pred letom dni je bila najboljša Američanka Madison Keys, letos pa bo veliko oči uprtih predvsem v Jeleno Ostapenko, latvijsko senzacijo, ki je slavila na Roland Garrosu. Slovence v finalu čaka Japonska, ki je v drugem polfinalu z zmago proti Avstraliji utišala domače navijače, vendarle pa se zdi, da bo našo reprezentanco težko presenetila

Ekipa iz Talina je spoštovanja vredna ekipa, vseeno pa so izbranci Simona Rožmana v rahli vlogi favorita. Bodo to potrdili tudi na igrišču? Z dobrim izidom na prvi tekmi bi si močno olajšali delo pred povratno tekmo na gostujočem terenu(n)

programme.title: Svetovna liga, 2. skupina - Finale: Slovenija - Japonska
programme.desc: Slovenska odbojkarska reprezentanca je na krilih Mitje Gasparinija v polfinalu zaključnega turnirja v Avstraliji odpihnila Nizozemsko, ki ni niti v enem trenutku ogrozila zmago izbrancev Slobodana Kovača. Slovence v finalu čaka Japonska, ki je v drugem polfinalu z zmago proti Avstraliji utišala domače navijače, vendarle pa se zdi, da bo našo reprezentanco težko presenetila(n)

programme.title: Prijateljska tekma: Olympiacos - Ludogorets
programme.desc: Številni evropski klubi so že začeli s pripravami, saj začetek kvalifikacijskih bojev za nastop v evropskih tekmovanjih ni več daleč. Kdo bo boljši na obračunu med Olympiacosom in Ludogorcem?

programme.title: Italijanska liga - Finale (4. tekma) - Naj tekme sezone: Trentino - Venezia
programme.desc: Potem ko je Milano povsem odpovedal v polfinalu proti Trentu, je postalo jasno, da bomo v Italiji dobili novega prvaka. Trentino šestič ali Venezia tretjič v klubski zgodovini? Eni in drugi v letošnji končnici igrajo izjemno in atraktivno, kar napoveduje nepredvidljivo serijo do samega konca

programme.title: Spanish league - Naj tekme sezone: Las Palmas - Atletico Madrid (0:5)
programme.desc: Španska nogometna liga, bolj poznana pod vzdevkom La Liga, je najelitnejše nogometno tekmovanje v Španiji. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1929. V ligi nastopa 20 klubov, kjer vsako sezono nekdo postane prvak in izpade v špansko drugo ligo. Najuspešnejša kluba sta madridski Real in Barcelona. Skupaj sta ligo osvojila kar 55 krat. Zadnji naslov je romal v roke Barcelone

programme.title: La Liga Promises - New Jersey (U12) - 1/2 finale 1: Valencia - Barcelona
programme.desc: Potem ko so se nadarjeni nogometaši španskih velikanov med seboj merili v Villarrealu, bodo sedaj svoje znanje preizkusili še na mednarodnem turnirju v New Yorku, kjer se bodo merili tudi z najboljšimi klubi iz Amerike. Kdo ima bolj nadarjene nogometaše? Španci ali Američani?

programme.title: La Liga Promises - New Jersey (U12) - 1/2 finale 2: Villarreal - Real Madrid

programme.title: Evropsko prvenstvo - Ukrajina: Finale
programme.desc: Najboljši evropski amaterski boksarji so te dni zbrani v Ukrajini, kjer poteka evropsko prvenstvo. Kdo je na prvenstvo prišel najbolje pripravljen in bo domov odšel z žlahtnim odličjem okoli vratu? Na žalost je četverica slovenskih predstavnikov hitro zaključila svojo pot in so ostali brez možnosti za odličja

programme.desc: Barclays Center v Brooklynu bo gostil nabor lige NBA pred naslednjo sezono. programme.desc: CSKA in Khimki sta edini ekipi z naslovom v Ligi VTB, a Moskovčani so se zmage veselili kar sedemkrat, ekipa iz Kazana pa zgolj enkrat. programme.title: Hot Dog Eating Contest
programme.desc: The 2014 Nathan's Famous International event from Coney Island, N.Y. Joey Chestnut put down a record 69 dogs and buns (in 10 minutes) last year for his seventh title, surpassing the mark of Takeru Kobayashi. Matt Stonie heads the challengers, having recently defeated Chestnut four times in other contests involving birthday cake, gyros, tacos and burgers. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Hot Dog Eating Contest
programme.desc: The 100th Nathan's Famous International event from Coney Island, N.Y. Joey Chestnut bids for his ninth-straight title, while Miki Sudo is defending women's champ after consuming 34 dogs and buns (in 10 minutes) last year. Chestnut's best is 69 (in 2013). (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Hot Dog Eating Contest
programme.desc: The 101st Nathan's Famous International event from Coney Island, N.Y. Matt Stonie ended eight-time champ Joey Chestnut's reign last year, putting away 62 dogs and buns (in 10 minutes) to Chestnut's 60. Miki Sudo repeated as women's champ with 38, seven more than former champ Sonya Thomas. (repeat) (cc)

programme.desc: Conclusion of a look at the 1980s Celtics-Lakers rivalry, focusing on the three years after the 1984 NBA Finals, as the teams' disdain for each other gradually turns to respect while meeting in two more Finals. From filmmakers Jim Podhoretz and Jon Hock. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia. (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: SEC Storied
programme.desc: The story of football's Manning family, focusing not only on the careers of Ole Miss star Archie and his NFL sons Peyton and Eli, but on the sudden death of Archie's father and its impact on his approach to fatherhood. Olivia and oldest son Cooper also appear, along with numerous friends and relatives. John Goodman narrates. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Wide receiver Randy Moss is profiled by filmmaker Marquis Daisy in a journey back to the small town of Rand, W.Va., where troubles with the law nealry derailed Moss's career before he landed at Marshall and began making national headlines on the field. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: SEC Storied
programme.desc: A look at the on-going relationship between LSU basketball icons Shaquille O'Neal and Dale Brown, who spent 1989-92 together in Baton Rouge after first meeting in Germany when Shaq was 13. Narrated by Louisiana native Tim McGraw. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Chronicling Oklahoma Sooners star Brian Bosworth's days as "The Boz" under football coach Barry Switzer. Both men reflect on their father-son relationship in three memorable seasons (1984-86) in Norman, while also discussing how their lives have changed. Directed by Thaddeus D. Matula. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: The rise of sports-marketing pioneer Sonny Vaccaro, who was instrumental in launching Nike's "Air Jordan" empire in the '80s and ushered in a new era of high-school hoops in the '90s. Interviews include Larry Brown, Brandon Jennings and Tracy McGrady. Directed by Jon Weinbach and Dan Marks. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: An in-depth profile of polarizing Duke basketball great Christian Laettner, the only player to start in four consecutive Final Fours. Rory Karpf directs a "gloves-off" examination of the man who has been seen by many as the "Blue Devil Himself." (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Polarizing football coach Bill McCartney and his revitalization of the Colorado Buffaloes is chronicled, examining off-the-field lows as well as the high of a 1990 national title. McCartney was founder of the Promise Keepers, a Christian men's ministry. Directed by Jim Podhoretz. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Chronicling the rise and fall of Pete Carroll's reign as USC Trojans football coach, featuring three Heisman winners (later cut to two), a 34-game win streak and the pivotal 2006 Rose Bowl against Texas. Directed by Aaron Rahsaan Thomas. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: SEC Storied
programme.desc: Chronicling LSU's dramatic 1996 College World Series win on a championship-game walk-off home run by diminutive infielder Warren Morris. Director Kenan K. Holley revisits one of college baseball's signature moments, 20 years later. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: A 10-year retrospective on the 2006 Duke lacrosse case in which three players were charged with rape, only to have all charges dropped a year later. Director Marina Zenovich explores the case's hot-button issues of sex, race, class and violence, and the turbulent period's lasting impact on the players and the program. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: SEC Storied
programme.desc: Chronicling Jerry Jones and Jimmy Johnson in their days as Arkansas football teammates--part of an undefeated national champion squad in 1964--long before joining forces to win two Super Bowls with the Dallas Cowboys. Directed by Corey Frost. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: The high-flying Houston Cougars basketball squad of the early '80s is chronicled, featuring Hakeem Olajuwon, Clyde Drexler and others from Guy Lewis's three straight Final Four teams. Also: role player Benny Anders' disappearance. Directed by Chip Rives. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.desc: 37 amateur shooters have gathered at the CMP Talladega Marksmanship Park in Alabama to compete for the American Marksman Championship

programme.title: Trijicon's World of Sports Afield
programme.sub-title: Mongolia - A Quest for Argali Pt. 1
programme.desc: Part 1. Dan Catlin heads on an expedition to the legendary sheep pastures of Mongolia. A quest for the world's largest wild sheep is at hand, as Dan and his team chase both dreams and argalis(n)

programme.title: Hornady's Dark & Dangerous
programme.sub-title: When Africa Is in Your Blood, There Is No Cure
programme.desc: Rich and Jim cover guns, ammo and more for the AR-15; the guys talk carry-gun break-in; and they debate the merits of 9mm vs. .45 ACP in the 1911 pistol(n)

programme.title: Razor Dobbs Alive
programme.desc: Razor hunts wildebeest and zebra in Africa with his 10mm auto pistol(n)

programme.title: Carter's W.A.R.
programme.desc: A look at the dangers rhinos face in Africa(n)

programme.title: Spook Nation
programme.desc: Spook has spent the early part of the year transforming this farm in the CRP program into a whitetail paradise in order to give his daughter, Cassie, her first chance to kill a mature buck(n)

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Cooking Special: Wild to Table: Meateater Memorable Meals
programme.desc: Steve cooks rainbow trout he caught in southwest Montana(n)

programme.title: Winchester Deadly Passion
programme.desc: Melissa Bachman heads to Alaska with her dad in search of a big black bear with good friend Jason Boyer on Prince of Wales Island(n)

programme.title: The Most Wanted List
programme.desc: In the treacherous mountains of New Zealand and Jessie Jo's red stag already checked off the list, Jess Smith has her sights set on tahr(n)

programme.title: Wildlifers
programme.sub-title: Monster Mule Deer and Bighorn Rams
programme.desc: The Wildlifers are in Colorado trying to get Stephanie a behemoth mule deer, while Dan has a big surprise for his longtime guide Bridger Petrini. Finally, Dan's brother Thomas shows up for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to take a bighorn ram(n)

programme.title: The Fierce Life
programme.desc: The staff joins Beavercreek Outfitters in search of big bulls in New Mexico. A Fierce customer tries out her new Fierce rifle(n)

programme.title: West of Texas
programme.desc: Hunting in the untouched wilderness of Canada's Northwest Territories, Stephen West and friend Gary Sitton are in a man-against-nature situation. The main focus of this hunt is a Dall sheep for Gary(n)

programme.title: Into High Country
programme.desc: Jason bowhunts his home state of Montana for bull elk. After a few days of finding nothing, Jason has an encounter with the biggest bull of his life(n)

programme.title: Pure Hunting
programme.desc: Will Schmidt heads to his property in Nebraska for a last-minute, self-filmed whitetail hunt. The area had been hit hard by EHD in previous years so he's hoping the quality of bucks has improved(n)

programme.title: Sheep Shape
programme.desc: Chad and Rick arrive in British Columbia to pursue Stone sheep and moose(n)

programme.title: The Western Hunter
programme.desc: Part 1. Nate Simmons bowhunts bugling bulls on public-land in the backcountry of Nevada. The elk rut is in full swing as Nate searches for one of the big bulls the area is known for(n)

programme.title: Guns & Gear
programme.desc: Hitting the range with the latest releases: Sig Sauer rifles and the XD-E from Springfield Armory. Also: check out the new Founder Series holsters from CrossBreed Holsters, tactical clothing from Propper; Liberty Safe handgun vaults and more(n)

programme.title: Guns & Ammo TV
programme.desc: Starting From Scratch highlights the R&D process for bringing new firearms, ammo and optics/accessories to market. Suppressors 101 covers everything from A-to-Z on this red-hot category(n)

programme.title: GunVenture
programme.desc: Tom and Ryan head north for some scattergun fun. While one heads to South Dakota for a pheasant hunt, the other heads to Michigan to rouse some grouse. Also: a custom-fitting with Dr. Shotgun for Tom and a fun drive in a 1973 fire truck for Ryan(n)

programme.title: Monster Bucks
programme.desc: Travel back in time as David Blanton takes a look back on Monster Bucks 1 & 2(n)

programme.title: Moment of Impact
programme.desc: Rob Dunham and James Brion take a look ahead at some of the highlights from the upcoming season. Then we join Ed Buck on his quest for mountain caribou in Alaska(n)

programme.title: Petersen's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: Donna Boddington attends the Wyoming Women's Antelope Hunt and mentors a young teacher on her first hunt. Both gals hunt hard and take their prairie goats in a walk-up spot-and-stalk hunt(n)

programme.title: Gallery of Guns
programme.desc: The Ruger GP100, Remington RP9, Colt Combat Unit Carbine and the Smith & Wesson Bodyguard are on display. Also: a Davidson's exclusive Mossberg 590(n)

programme.title: Handguns And Defensive Weapons
programme.desc: Rich and Jim cover guns, ammo and more for the AR-15; the guys talk carry-gun break-in; and they debate the merits of 9mm vs. .45 ACP in the 1911 pistol(n)

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.sub-title: Ryan Nitz and the Giant Snook
programme.desc: Ryan Nitz joins Captain Tom Rowland and Captain Rich Tudor to share his special connection to the giant snook of the east Florida coast(n)

programme.title: Reel Time With Florida Sportsman
programme.desc: Captain George Gozdz fishes for full moon snapper near St. Pete Beach, Fla(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Putting up kites and sight fishing is on top of the list for Steve Rodger and Scott Walker(n)

programme.title: In-Fisherman
programme.desc: The staff travles to some of the greatest fisheries in North America. They fish the Yukon River for gargantuan pike, fly in to a multispecies in northern Saskatchewan and reveal what it takes to catch two-pound bluegills(n)

programme.title: The Outfitters
programme.desc: Fred trades in his bow for a fly rod and Conway seeks his first archery kill(n)

programme.title: Hollywood Hunter
programme.desc: Darren Newsom (owner of Armscor Ammo) and the Hollywood Hunter are in hot pursuit for monster archery-season muleys(n)

programme.title: Brotherhood Outdoors
programme.desc: The Brotherhood series premiere begins with an introduction to Jon Scaife. He shares his history as a union member and Arizona firefighter, then travels to Kentucky to take a shot at a whitetail buck and a sip of homegrown bourbon(n)

programme.title: Winchester Deadly Passion
programme.desc: Melissa Bachman heads to Alaska with her dad in search of a big black bear with good friend Jason Boyer on Prince of Wales Island(n)

programme.title: The Most Wanted List
programme.desc: In the treacherous mountains of New Zealand and Jessie Jo's red stag already checked off the list, Jess Smith has her sights set on tahr(n)

programme.title: Red Rising
programme.desc: Eric Hale is hunting during the opening of archery season in his home state of Virginia. He is after a buck named Mr. Crabtree that has shown up on the Browning Trailcams. Eric searches for the oak tree where Mr. Crabtree feeds on acorns(n)

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Doug Roberts begins the process of weaning and tagging fawns. Valor, an abandoned fawn, lives through a horrible sickness and is released back to the herd(n)

programme.title: The Resistance TV
programme.desc: Kyle and Paul are in Texas at Holton deer hunts and discover a coyote population out of control. Fearing the loss of calves and fawns they call in a helicopter to do a little predator control followed by a few days of unbelievable turkey hunting(n)

programme.title: Big Boys TV
programme.desc: Part 1. The Johnson family heads back to Africa for the second time in search of African plains game(n)

programme.title: Big Deer TV
programme.desc: Part 1. Like moths to flame, Mike Hanback and friends are drawn to the Red Hills of Oklahoma for the November rut. Trijicon's Chuck Wahr encounters a big buck in shifting winds and Mike hits the ground with Scott Sanderford of Croton Creek Outfitters(n)

programme.title: North American Whitetail Television
programme.desc: Dr. James Kroll and Gordon Whittington tag-team Wyoming whitetails on an early-season crossbow hunt; Dr. Deer discusses the growing threat of mountain lion predation; and we examine supplemental water sources(n)

programme.title: In-Fisherman
programme.desc: The staff travles to some of the greatest fisheries in North America. They fish the Yukon River for gargantuan pike, fly in to a multispecies in northern Saskatchewan and reveal what it takes to catch two-pound bluegills(n)

programme.title: Bowhunter TV
programme.desc: Curt Wells relives the years of moose-hunting memories that have added up to a full-blown moose curse(n)

programme.title: Petersen's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: Donna Boddington attends the Wyoming Women's Antelope Hunt and mentors a young teacher on her first hunt. Both gals hunt hard and take their prairie goats in a walk-up spot-and-stalk hunt(n)

programme.title: Guns & Ammo TV
programme.desc: Starting From Scratch highlights the R&D process for bringing new firearms, ammo and optics/accessories to market. Suppressors 101 covers everything from A-to-Z on this red-hot category(n)

programme.title: On The Road With Rock & Aaron
programme.desc: Part 1. Rock and Steve head to Utah in the hopes to down an early-season mule deer with their New Breed bows(n)

programme.title: Small Town Hunting
programme.desc: The rut is whide open in the South, and Kevin Meacham finds himself stuck inside the office at his sales job. While hunting, a pink box stand may raise some questions, but it's probably the best place on the farm(n)

programme.title: Down South
programme.desc: Kicking off bow season with Jackie Caudle and friends. Also: Brock and Justin help the local 4H club get their bows dialed in(n)

programme.title: Trained Assassins
programme.desc: Part 1. Cragg Fitz and Ryan Wascom head to the legendary Holden Pasture lease to hunt with the owner/creator of Double Down Deer Feed in Texas(n)

programme.title: Backwoods Life
programme.desc: Michael Lee and Kevin Knighton bowhunt Kentucky along with Ryan and Kathy Whitaker. From early season velvet through the rut, Kentucky has big bucks on their feet(n)
